title: Moving the sitefinity logo
content:
The sitefinity logo by default exists at the bottom of the page...and it trys REALLY hard to stay there if you have a look at the CSS of the object.
Ok so moving the logo by CSS alone is super hard, what we need to use is jQuery. I first created a container on my page that I wanted the logo to live in
Ok, the next step is to then create the jQuery code to move the logo, this needs to happen in document.ready
So this calls the "movelogo" function 500ms after the page is deemed "ready".Â  You can put the movelogo function wherever you want, I kept it in an external file
Logo should now appear where you want :) Cheers
seoDescription: How to move the Sitefinity Community (mandatory) logo
